text: Hassanal Bolkiah (born Hassanal Bolkiah MuÂ´izzadin Waddaulah; 1946) is the Sultan and Yang Di-Pertuan of Brunei.Sultan of Brunei Declares Himself Infallible, Hello, 9 March 2006. He succeeded to the throne following the abdication of his father, Omar Ali Saifuddien III, in 1967. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Bruneian people Category:Living people Category:Sultans Category:Current national leaders
title: Hassanal Bolkiah
